mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.wupinguashi_name as wupinguashiName ,a.shiwuzhaoling_types as shiwuzhaolingTypes ,a.status_types as statusTypes ,a.wupinguashi_photo as wupinguashiPhoto ,a.wupinguashi_time as wupinguashiTime ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.wupinguashi_dizhi as wupinguashiDizhi ,a.wupinguashi_content as wupinguashiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM wupinguashi a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.wupinguashi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinguashiName},'%')
and a.shiwuzhaoling_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTypes}
and a.status_types = #{params.statusTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.wupinguashi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.wupinguashiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.wupinguashi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.wupinguashiTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.wupinguashi_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinguashiDizhi},'%')
and a.wupinguashi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.wupinguashiContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
